post.body: It bites. I hung extra decor., thinking I would have help taking down & packing. I won't feel like it with going back to work
Not till after the New Year. They are snowed in.
Then Tues. I will work for different company on another booth. Then I have X-mas eve. & The Day off. I don't know after that.
Happy belated Birthday. I got calls yesterday regarding work. Start on Sunday, doing Samsung booth for 2 days with 1 company.
Oh, had to scroll back 2 pages to find the link. I wasn't awake at that point. Very nice. When was your b-day?
Wow, what a great gift.
They gained you as a follower but didn't care to really follow you. Rude isn't it?
Great comeback. You must be wide awake. I still have the soar throat, stuffy nose & feel a bug feeling.
Way to go graceful.
We had snow in Las Vegas yesterday. We are expecting snow again Wed.
I found that most of my Artfire clicks come from Twitter as well.
Just left a comment on your new blog post.
The Jack Dempsey & the Convict. Fish. Going to go feed them.
Wow, love it. I'm awake now.
I don't know. Do you have it tagged for a child or kid? It would be cute on a jean jacket.
Why does the pain we inflict on ourselves always hurt worse than not?
Leaving to go finish Dean Koontz book.
This bracelet has had 242 views. I guess I should add more photos. http://tinyurl.com/59h969
How cool. Dawanda is starting a voucher plan. Kinda like gift card.
I missed that one. Where?
Good morning all. Finally stopped snowing in Vegas. They stopped all flights out of Mccarran. Low visibility & no ice equipment.
Made another sale on Dawanda yesterday. So, that's 2 for 2. How about a competition? ETSY or Dawanda, Dawanda or ETSY?
"The cat who doesn't act finicky loses control of his humans."-Morris http://funnyendofthetail.blogspot.com/
Good morning. Expecting snow today. I got some pictures when it snowed in Vegas 2 days ago. http://funnyendofthetail.blogspot.com/
I'm not going to give in to not feeling good. I'm going X-mas shopping for my husband & I. I'm not sick, I'm not sick, I'm not sick.
Cute animal quotes. http://funnyendofthetail.blogspot.com/
Good evening all. Worked 11 hrs. today on setting up CES. Face is wind burned. I spent 1/2 day in front of freight door,windy.
I'm signing out. Need to eat & take shower. Goodnight.
My brother is still snowed in. He lives in Portland, Or. My mother as well lives in Salem, Or. I don't miss the weather at all.
My In-laws have no power in Salem, Or. tonight. They do hope they get a break in weather to drive here for x-mas.
Good evening all. I worked 6 hours straight & got out of the LVCC. Due back at 7 A.M. Big Samsung booth.
I decided to enjoy a lighted tree today. I haven't turned the lights on in days.
Blood worms were given to fish. I questioned if I had the right cup in my hand. What a mess it would be if I poured coffee in instead.
Just gave canned food to the animals. Frozen blood worms are thawing in cup on desk next to me, don't drink. It is not your coffee.
Harley cat is thriving for attention this morning. He came up to the chair & stood up & touched me with his paw to get my attention again.
Good morning all. Going to work on my blog. I've had my blog tagged.
Good morning. Lots of stuff to do today. Only 2 days left off before I load in CES convention. Brr. No heat during ins or outs.
Signing out. Goodnight.
Going to go try making some oatmeal & choc. chip cookies.
Destroyed my New England Dark bread earlier I was making for my neighbors. I got a air bubble in it & cooked it too close to upper elements.
